body: Welcome team, please share initial findings from the Acholi hub interviews by Friday.
Draft insights report uploaded. Key outages tied to solar maintenance gaps.
Reviewed the report. Let's add visual of hub uptime trends per district.
Remember to include farmer payment history in your dashboard handover next week.
All pipelines running on schedule. Handover deck ready for Friday's review.
Can we include year-on-year retention in the hackathon analytics dashboard?
Yes, adding retention metric plus conversion funnel. Preview shared here.
Looks great. Please schedule training with the analytics team early December.
